featured.text: _(22)_ problem urged NASA to develop the first space toilet, a modified diaper.
They have been urged by governments to leave behind their traditions.
To ask for help to kill the red ant. (B) To urge people to protect the red ant.

definition.zh_def: 衝動，強烈的欲望或需求。
definition.en_def: A strong desire or impulse to do something.
definition.example: She felt an urge to call her friend after hearing the news.
